app.title: Grid Logic
app.subtitle: Challenge your mind with classic Sudoku puzzles

hints.noHintsAvailable: No obvious hints available. Try looking for cells with the fewest possible numbers, or examine if any numbers appear only once in a row, column, or 3×3 box.
hints.unableToAnalyze: Unable to analyze the board right now. Try examining cells with fewer possible numbers or look for obvious placements.

techniques.naked_single: A cell that can only contain one number based on the existing numbers in its row, column, and 3×3 box.
techniques.hidden_single: A number that can only go in one place in a row, column, or box.
techniques.naked_pair: Two cells in the same unit that can only contain the same two numbers, eliminating those numbers from other cells.
techniques.pointing_pair: All candidates for a number in a box are confined to a single row or column.
techniques.box_line_reduction: All candidates for a number in a row or column are confined to a single box.
techniques.x_wing: A rectangular pattern that allows elimination of candidates.
techniques.xy_wing: A pattern with a pivot and two pincers that eliminates candidates.
techniques.swordfish: A 3×3 pattern that allows elimination of candidates across rows and columns.
techniques.note_elimination: Remove notes that are no longer valid
techniques.direct_hint: The correct value for this cell

detailedExplanations.naked_single: {{techniqueName}}: All other numbers are blocked in this cell by existing values in the row, column, and box.
detailedExplanations.hidden_single_row: {{techniqueName}}: {{number}} can only go in this position within row {{row}}.
detailedExplanations.hidden_single_col: {{techniqueName}}: {{number}} can only go in this position within column {{col}}.
detailedExplanations.hidden_single_box: {{techniqueName}}: {{number}} can only go in this position within {{boxName}}.
detailedExplanations.naked_pair: {{techniqueName}}: Two cells can only contain {{num1}} and {{num2}}, so eliminate these numbers from other cells in this {{unitType}}.
detailedExplanations.pointing_pair_row: {{techniqueName}}: {{number}} in this box is confined to one row, so eliminate {{number}} from this row outside the box.
detailedExplanations.pointing_pair_col: {{techniqueName}}: {{number}} in this box is confined to one column, so eliminate {{number}} from this column outside the box.
detailedExplanations.x_wing: {{techniqueName}}: An X-Wing is formed when a number appears as a candidate in exactly two cells in each of two rows, and these cells are aligned in the same two columns (forming a rectangle). Since the number must appear exactly once in each row and column, we can eliminate it from all other cells in those two columns.
detailedExplanations.xy_wing: {{techniqueName}}: An XY-Wing consists of three cells: a pivot with candidates XY, and two pincers with candidates XZ and YZ. Since the pivot must contain either X or Y, one pincer must contain Z. This allows us to eliminate Z from any cell that can see both pincers.
detailedExplanations.swordfish: {{techniqueName}}: A Swordfish is formed when a number appears as a candidate in exactly 2-3 cells in each of three rows, and these candidates are confined to the same three columns. This creates a pattern that allows elimination from other cells in those columns.
detailedExplanations.box_line_reduction: {{techniqueName}}: Box Line Reduction occurs when all candidates for a number in a row (or column) are confined to a single 3×3 box. Since the number must appear somewhere in that row, it can be eliminated from other parts of the box.

messages.incorrectValue: This cell contains an incorrect value. The correct answer is {{correctValue}}.
messages.autoFilled: Auto-filled {{value}} in selected cell. This was the only valid number.
messages.candidateSuggestion: This cell can be {{candidates}}. Try adding these as notes to help you solve the puzzle.
messages.incorrectCellValue: The value {{value}} in row {{row}}, column {{col}} is incorrect. Try clearing this cell and looking for the right number.
messages.eliminateNotes: In row {{row}}, column {{col}}, you can eliminate the note{{plural}} {{notes}} because {{reason}} with other numbers in the same row, column, or box.
messages.eliminateFromRow: Eliminate {{number}} from row {{row}} outside the box
messages.eliminateFromColumn: Eliminate {{number}} from column {{col}} outside the box
messages.xWingRows: X-Wing pattern found for {{number}}: forms rectangle in rows {{row1}} and {{row2}}, columns {{col1}} and {{col2}}. This eliminates {{number}} from other cells in these columns.
messages.xWingCols: X-Wing pattern found for {{number}}: forms rectangle in columns {{col1}} and {{col2}}, rows {{row1}} and {{row2}}. This eliminates {{number}} from other cells in these rows.
messages.xyWingPattern: XY-Wing pattern found: pivot at ({{pivotRow}},{{pivotCol}}) with pincers at ({{pincer1Row}},{{pincer1Col}}) and ({{pincer2Row}},{{pincer2Col}}). This eliminates {{candidate}} from cells that see both pincers.
messages.swordfishPattern: Swordfish pattern found for {{number}} in rows {{rows}}. This eliminates {{number}} from other cells in columns {{columns}}.
messages.boxLineReductionRow: Box Line Reduction: {{number}} in row {{row}} is confined to box {{box}}. This eliminates {{number}} from other cells in this box outside row {{row}}.
messages.boxLineReductionCol: Box Line Reduction: {{number}} in column {{col}} is confined to box {{box}}. This eliminates {{number}} from other cells in this box outside column {{col}}.

mistakes.limitReached: You've reached the mistake limit for this difficulty level.
mistakes.youveMade: You've made {{mistakes}} out of {{maxMistakes}} allowed mistakes
mistakes.restartDescription: Reset this puzzle to try again with the same numbers
mistakes.disableNote: This will disable the mistake limit for this game only

analytics.title: Game Analytics
analytics.trackProgress: Track your progress and improve your solving skills
analytics.noCompletedGames: No completed games yet. Finish a game to see your analytics!
analytics.noDataAvailable: No analytics data available yet. Play some games to see your progress!
analytics.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete all analytics data? This cannot be undone.
analytics.permanentWarning: These actions are permanent and cannot be undone.

learning.title: Learning Center
learning.centerSubtitle: Master every solving technique with interactive guides and examples. Experimental AI-generated guides.

loading.selectToStart: Select a difficulty to start playing

pause.progressSaved: Your progress is saved. Resume when you're ready!
pause.orUseButton: Or use the Resume button in the navbar

tips.clickCells: Click cells to select and highlight related numbers
tips.numbersAppear: Numbers appear horizontally below the grid
